thread.title: Boy meets baby brother for first time in Ohio hospital
thread.title_full: Boy meets baby brother for first time in Ohio hospital | Daily Mail Online

author: Emily Chan For Mailonline
title: Boy meets baby brother for first time in Ohio hospital
text:
A two-year-old boy could not stop hugging and showering his newborn baby brother with kisses when he met him at hospital for the first time.
Logan Crahan was filmed walking into his mother Alexa's room at the ProMedica Toledo Hospital in Ohio with his arms wide open as he greeted his brother Liam.
After being lifted up next to his baby brother, he hugs his head repeatedly and kisses him.
Logan Crahan, two, could not stop hugging and showering his newborn baby brother with kisses when he met him at hospital for the first time
As his mother tells him 'I've missed you', Logan carries on putting his arms around the baby.
The boys' fathers Alex said: 'The feeling when you see your two-year-old walk right in and go right for his brother is something I can't put into words.
'We could not have been happier or more excited when Logan strolled right over and began hugging Liam.
'Before Logan came in, Alexa started crying because she was nervous about how he would react.
'She felt bad as he has always been our little baby and we didn't want him to be sad or upset with a new baby now in the picture.'
Logan, who is seen wearing a top with 'Big Bro' written on it in the video, was excited to meet his new sibling as soon as he found out Alexa was pregnant.
The toddler, wearing a 'Big Bro' top, was filmed walking into his mother Alexa's room at the ProMedica Toledo Hospital in Ohio
Alex said: 'He would every single day hug his mommies belly and point at it and say "baby".
'It's weird because I have two daughters Savannah, 10, and Hailey, 12, and for whatever reason Logan is obsessed with them.
'To see him also have that same passion and love for Liam is something that I don't think will ever go away.'
More than a week later, Logan is still demanding cuddles with his baby brother.
Alex said: 'Logan will sit on the couch and put the nursing pillow around him himself which is his way of telling us that he wants to hold Liam.
'Logan continues to be an amazing big brother and offering to help us with him whenever he can.'
Logan (pictured with his parents and new baby brother) was excited to meet his new sibling as soon as he found out Alexa was pregnant
